author: Confucius
message: When you see a good person, think of becoming like him. When you see someone not so good, reflect on your own weak points.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anne Lindbergh
message: If one is estranged from oneself, then one is estranged from others too. If one is out of touch with oneself, then one cannot touch others.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dale Carnegie
message: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
title: Thought of the day

author: John Lennon
message: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one, I hope someday you will join us, and the world will live as one.
title: Thought of the day
